properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
IONIAN SEA.
DNC 09.
1. OCEANOGRAPHIC OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
   BY M/V POLAR EMPRESS TOWING 12
   8000 METER LONG CABLES IN AREAS BOUND BY:
   A. 38-24.9N 020-45.1E, 38-28.3N 020-53.6E,
      38-16.0N 021-13.0E, 38-03.0N 021-18.3E,
      37-49.8N 020-54.2E, 38-00.0N 020-47.5E,
      38-07.3N 020-49.5E, 38-14.1N 020-43.4E.
   B. 38-40.5N 019-02.9E, 38-57.5N 019-34.1E,
      36-26.8N 021-19.5E, 36-03.7N 020-47.0E.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3035/15.
